 Dolphins are mammals.Dolphins can swim up to 260 m. below the surface of the ocean.Dolphins can stay up to 15 minutes under water. Dolphins use a technique called echolocation. Dolphins are social beings.Dolphins are Cetacenas.
 
 The largest dolphin is the Orca, also known as “killer whale”.The most popular dolphin is the “bottlenose dolphin". Dolphins are warm-blooded.The botllenose dolphin brain weighs 1500-1600 grams.Dolphins communicate efficiently. Dolphins can swim 5 to 12 kilometers per hour.
